title: Bai Bian Mading season3
synopsis: Variety Martin Season 3 is the third season of the Variety Martin series produced by Shanghai Today Animation Film and Television Culture Co., Ltd. Martin, a 7-year-old boy, wakes up every morning and finds himself transformed into a different role. He is Variety Martin. Sometimes, he is a brave superman; sometimes, he is a clever inventor; sometimes, he is a lovely scarecrow. With the help of good friends Guo Mo and Luo Na, they overcome all difficulties and unfold every interesting story with ups and downs. This is a fantasy adventure about justice, challenge and friendship. (translated from iqiyi)
